long_description: The lightweight, training-oriented Arc'teryx Stradium Pants for men offer good coverage and warmth for running in cool weather. Smooth, stretchy polyester fabric breathes well, dries fast and features a durable water repellent finish to repel light moisture. Side zippers at ankle make it easy to get pants on and off over shoes and have locking zippers. 2 hand pockets and an interior key pocket. The Arc'teryx Stradium Pants for men have an athletic fit.
short_description: The lightweight, training-oriented Arc'teryx Stradium Pants for men offer good coverage and warmth for running in cool weather.
